Package sailpoint.recommender

Class RecommenderUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • sailpoint.recommender.RecommenderUtil
  • public class RecommenderUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Some useful high-level utility methods for dealing with recommendations for approvals and certs

      • createRecommendationRequestsForApprovalSet

        public static java.util.List<sailpoint.recommender.RecommendationRequest> createRecommendationRequestsForApprovalSet​(java.lang.String identityId,
                                                                                                                     ApprovalSet approvalSet,
                                                                                                                     SailPointContext ctx,
                                                                                                                     sailpoint.api.CachedManagedAttributer cma)
                                                                                                              throws GeneralException
        Build the list of RecommendationRequest (for a bulk request) that can be used to get the Recommendation objects for an ApprovalSet
        Parameters:
        approvalSet - the ApprovalSet to build the list of requests for
        ctx - the database context
        cma - CachedManagedAttributer instance
        Returns:
        the list of RecommendatiobRequest objects that correspond to the given ApprovalSet
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • getApprovalItemRecommendation

        public static Recommendation getApprovalItemRecommendation​(java.lang.String identityId,
                                                           ApprovalItem item,
                                                           SailPointContext ctx,
                                                           sailpoint.api.CachedManagedAttributer cma)
                                                    throws GeneralException
        Get the Recommendation for a given ApprovalItem
        Parameters:
        item - the ApprovalItem to fetch the Recommendation for
        ctx - the database context
        cma - CachedManagedAttributer instance
        Returns:
        the Recommendation for the ApprovalItem; or null if no recommender is found, or the approvalItem type is unsupported
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • createRecommendationRequestForApprovalItem

        public static sailpoint.recommender.RecommendationRequest createRecommendationRequestForApprovalItem​(java.lang.String identityId,
                                                                                                     ApprovalItem approvalItem,
                                                                                                     SailPointContext ctx,
                                                                                                     sailpoint.api.CachedManagedAttributer cma)
                                                                                              throws GeneralException
        Build a RecommendationRequest that is appropriate for the given approvalItem
        Parameters:
        identityId - the id of the identity that will be modified if the approval item is approved
        approvalItem - the ApprovalItem describing a line item in an ApprovalSet
        ctx - database context
        cma - CachedManagedAttributer instance
        Returns:
        the RecommendationRequest, or null if we don't know how to build a request for the approval item
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • getApplicationFromCertifiable

        public static Application getApplicationFromCertifiable​(Certifiable certifiable)
        Retrieve the Application associated to the Certifiable. Currently only supports EntitlementGroups.
        Parameters:
        certifiable - The Certifiable to retrieve the Application for.
        Returns:
        The Application that uses this Certifiable.

      • getManagedAttributeForEntitlement

        public static java.lang.String getManagedAttributeForEntitlement​(Application app,
                                                                 java.lang.String attributeName,
                                                                 java.lang.String attributeValue,
                                                                 sailpoint.api.CachedManagedAttributer cma)
        Retrieve the ManagedAttribute ID for the provided entitlement attributes.
        Parameters:
        app - Application that uses this entitlement.
        attributeName - Name of the entitlement.
        attributeValue - Value of the entitlement.
        cma - CachedManagedAttributer instance
        Returns:
        The ID of the ManagedAttribute that matches the provided entitlement details.

      • getManagedAttributeForPermission

        public static java.lang.String getManagedAttributeForPermission​(Application app,
                                                                Permission permission,
                                                                sailpoint.api.CachedManagedAttributer cma)
        Retrieve the ManagedAttribute ID for the provided Permission.
        Parameters:
        app - Application that uses this Permission.
        permission - The Permission to use.
        cma - CachedManagedAttributer instance
        Returns:
        The ID of the ManagedAttribute that matches the provided Permission details.

      • getCertificationRecommendations

        public static java.util.Map<sailpoint.recommender.RecommendationRequest,​java.util.List<CertificationItem>> getCertificationRecommendations​(java.util.Map<sailpoint.recommender.RecommendationRequest,​java.util.List<CertificationItem>> requests,
                                                                                                                                                 SailPointContext ctx)
                                                                                                                                          throws GeneralException
        Using the currently selected recommender, evaluate each given RecommendationRequest (using the key set of the given requests map) and write recommendation into each of the RecommendationRequest's associated CertificationItem objects.
        Parameters:
        requests - this is the map whose key set is iterated over. The values on the map are updated. The map is also returned.
        ctx - database context
        Returns:
        the requests parameter is updated and returned
        Throws:
        GeneralException - if there is a problem retrieving recommendations.

      • isRecommenderConfigured

        public static boolean isRecommenderConfigured​(SailPointContext ctx)
        Checks whether a recommender has been selected and successfully configured.
        Parameters:
        ctx - SailPointContext
        Returns:
        True if a recommender is configured, otherwise false.
